title: BC端怎么添加子服
author: 哇我额
txt_content: 怎么添加BC端的子服？修改 config.yml 较容易出错

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 恋 于 2019-11-27 13:20 编辑 
ip_forward: true
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: 
groups:
  md_5:
  - admin
servers:
  lobby:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25566
    restricted: false
  server1:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25567
    restricted: false
  server2:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25568
    restricted: false
  server3:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25569
    restricted: false
  server4:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25570
    restricted: false
  server5:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25571
    restricted: false
  server6:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25572
    restricted: false
  server7:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25573
    restricted: false
  server8:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25574
    restricted: false
  server9:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25575
    restricted: false
  server10:
    motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
    address: localhost:25576
    restricted: false
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
listeners:
- query_port: 25565
  motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: false
  proxy_protocol: false
  forced_hosts:
    pvp.md-5.net: pvp
  ping_passthrough: false
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25565
  max_players: 10000
  tab_size: 60
  force_default_server: true
prevent_proxy_connections: false
permissions:
  default:
  - bungeecord.command.list
  admin: null
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
connection_throttle: 4000复制代码这是配置好的 直接在server-X下面设置你子服的端口号就行了
